document.docAuthor: Volynkin, Anton V., Černý, Karel & Huang, Si-Yao
document.masterDocTitle: A review of the Barsine hypoprepioides (Walker, 1862) species-group, with descriptions of fifteen new species and a new subspecies (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of the Barsine hypoprepioides (Walker, 1862) species-group, with descriptions of fifteen new species and a new subspecies (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Barsine amaculata Volynkin & Černý, 2016
, Zootaxa , 4200 (2): 345, figs 3, 4, 9, 10, 14 ( Type locality: “S. Vietnam , Bao Loc, Rung Cat Tien, 11.32’N, 107.48’E, 1500 m ”).

Type material examined .
Holotype
( Figs 68 , 180 ): “S. Vietnam , Bao Loc, Rung Cat Tien, 11.32’N, 107.48’E,
1500 m
,
10–20.XII.1992
, Sek. Wald, leg. Sinajev & Simonov, ex coll. Schintlmeister ” / “Slide AV1802 ♂ A. Volynkin ” (Coll. NHMUK );
paratypes
: 1 ♀ , same label as holotype , slide AV1801 ♀ Volynkin (coll. CKC ); 3 ♂ , South Viet- nam, Lam Dong province , Lac Duong district , Tay Nguyen Highlands , Nui Ba National Park , leg. Vo Van Nhon , slide AV1599 ♂ Volynkin (coll. CAV ); 1 ♂ ,
IV.2016
, Central Vietnam , Thua Thien-Hue province , Annamite Mts. , Bach Ma National Park ,
1400 m
, leg. Le Luong Thanh (coll. CAV ).

Other material examined .
VIETNAM
: 1 ♂ , N Vietnam , 16[00]–
1800 m
, Mt. Fan-si-pan ( West ), Cha-pa , sec- ondary forest, 22.20’N 103.40’E, ( Cult. ),
IV.1994
, leg. Sinjaev & loc. coll. ( Coll. MWM/ ZSM )
;
1 ♂ , North Vietnam , Tam Dao , (secondary forest), 60 NW Hanoi ,
1200 m
, 21.34´N, 105.20´E,
01–05.V.1993
, leg. Sinjaev & Simonov ( Coll. MWM/ ZSM )
;
8 ♂ , North Vietnam , Tam Dao , 60 NW Hanoi , 21.34´N, 105.20´E,
1200 m
,
01–15.XI.1992
(secondary forest), leg. Sinjaev & Simonov ( Coll. MWM/ ZSM )
;
1 ♂ ,
IV.2016
, Central Vietnam , Prov. Thua Thien- Hue , Bach Ma Mt. ,
1400 m
, leg. Le Luong Thanh ( Coll. CAV )
;
24 ♂ , 15 ♀ , S Vietnam , Bao Loc , Rung Cat Tien , 11.32´N, 107.48´E,
1500 m
,
10–20.XII.1992
, secondary forest, leg. Sinjaev & Simonov , ex coll. A. Schintlmeister ( Coll. MWM/ ZSM )
;
1 ♂ , 3 ♀ , South Vietnam , Bao Loc (secondary forest), Rung Cat Tien ,
1500 m
, (11.32´N, 107.48´E),
10–20.XII.1992
, leg. Sinjaev & Simonov ( Coll. MWM/ ZSM )
;
1 ♂ , S Vietnam , Plato Tay Nguyen , Mt. Ngoc Linh ,
900–1400 m
, 15°02´N , 107°59´E ,
10–25.VIII.1996
, leg. Sinjaev & Afonin ( Coll. MWM/ ZSM )
.

Diagnosis . Forewing length is 9–10 mm in males and 10–10.5 mm in females. Externally,
B. amaculata
is similar to
B. fasciata
and
B. mesomene
sp. n.
, and differs from
B. fasciata
by the absence of a discal spot of forewing;
amaculata
differs from
B. mesomene
sp. n.
by its creamy white forewing coloration (that is pale yellowish in
B. mesomene
sp. n.
), shorter dentation of postmedial line, and the absence of a postmedial transverse line on hindwing (that is more or less developed in
B. mesomene
sp. n.
). The male genitalia of
B. amaculata
are similar to those of
B. mesomene
sp. n.
, but differ by the thinner, needle-like distal costal process, the longer distal section of valva, the longer distal saccular process, the smaller ventral diverticulum without granulation, and the absence of a medial row of cornuti in vesica. The female genitalia of
B. amaculata
differ from those of
B. mesomene
sp. n.
by the broader antrum, the smaller corpus bursae and the shorter appendix bursae.
